title: Game Freezing
body: I've been playing league with some friends quite a bit lately. However, every few games, my frame rate would gradually drop until the screen would literally freeze for several seconds at a time. I've tried quitting the game, then reconnecting, but when I do that, my pc would freeze on the game screen, and prevent any further actions (task manager, alt+tabbing etc). The only way to fix this was to force restart my pc. However, due to this, I've been placed in the low priority queue (because I'm disconnecting to fix my game). Does anyone know a fix?

replies.body:
The first thing I would recommend is update your graphics drivers, as this tends to be the most likely culprit for issues like these.

Next I would look at the fixes here in case your issue is related: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs

Failing that I'd run through any fixes found here you haven't tried yet: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting

If all else fails submit a ticket to Player Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
